name: Association for Sustainable Community Development
briefDescription: Our organization mainly works for women empowerment. We identified 3148 Below Poverty Line (BPL) families in 26 villages of Vandavasi and Cheyyar Taluks of Thiruvannamalai District. We organized 250 women self help groups enrolling the women as members from Below Poverty Line (BPL) families. We planned and had been implementing key activities based on Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) to enable our target women to attain social and economic empowerment
